about_the_game:
A cosmic anomaly has shattered the universe, leaving it fractured and chaotic. Fragments of a broken world—eroded rocks, rusted machinery, ancient ruins—drift together in an unstable mix. Past and future blur as you navigate a constantly shifting realm, where every fall sends you back to the beginning. Conquer the void before it consumes everything.

Master Merciless Platforming

Jump and dash through disintegrating cosmic chaos. Deploy your platform spawner to save a fall or forge your own path to the summit.

Balance Vital Resources

Every action drains energy, from leaping between rock formations to executing strategic parkour moves. Replenish your life force by landing on rocky outcrops or collecting scattered matter and minerals. Energy management is crucial in this dynamic struggle for survival.

Obtain Game-Changing Upgrades

Unlock powerful upgrades that turn the tide in your favor. Dramatically increase your speed, extend dash distance, amplify jump height, and gain access to new types of spawnable platforms.

Conquer the Chaos

The world is procedurally generated. Each run reshuffles the cosmos, crafting a uniquely volatile environment. Navigate ever-shifting pathways as you race to the top.

name: Void Climber

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Climb through the ruins of a collapsing universe in this unforgiving parkour platformer. Obtain powerful upgrades to reach insane speeds, but one misstep reshuffles the path and sends you back to the start.
